description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Chow Mein Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Chow Mein Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Continental Naturally Tasty Chicken Chow Mein Recipe Base
1.5 tbs Lee Kum Kee Soy Sce Salt Reduced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok, or a large frying pan, over medium-high heat. Stir-fry until browned. Add carrot, stir fry for 2 minutes. Add cabbage, stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add snow peas and stir fry for another minute.
Stir in prepared noodles. Add combined recipe base, water (190ml), and soy sauce. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes or until sauce thickens and noodles are heated through.
